TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CustomValidator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator

summary.span: 对输入控件执行用户定义的验证。

span.span: Performs user-defined validation on an input control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用控件为输入控件提供用户定义的验证函数。Use the control to provide a user-defined validation function for an input control. 控件是从输入控件验证，这使您能够控制其中验证消息将显示一个单独的控件。The control is a separate control from the input control it validates, which allows you to control where the validation message is displayed. 验证控件始终在服务器上执行验证。Validation controls always perform validation on the server. 它们还具有完整的客户端实现，它允许脚本启用浏览器 （如 Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 及更高版本） 客户端上执行验证。They also have complete client-side implementation that allows script-enabled browsers (such as Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 and later) to perform validation on the client. 客户端验证发送到服务器之前检查用户输入，从而增强了验证过程。Client-side validation enhances the validation process by checking user input before it is sent to the server. 这使得在提交表单时，从而避免往返行程的服务器端验证所需信息之前客户端上检测到的错误。This allows errors to be detected on the client before the form is submitted, thus avoiding the round trip of information necessary for server-side validation. 若要创建服务器端验证函数，提供的处理程序执行验证的事件。To create a server-side validation function, provide a handler for the event that performs the validation. 可以使用访问中的输入控件进行验证的字符串属性对象传递到事件处理程序作为参数。The string from the input control to validate can be accessed by using the property of the object passed into the event handler as a parameter. 验证结果然后存储在属性对象。The result of the validation is then stored in the property of the object. 若要创建客户端验证函数，请首先添加前面所述的服务器端验证函数。To create a client-side validation function, first add the server-side validation function described earlier. 接下来，将客户端验证脚本函数添加到 ASP.NET (.aspx) 页。Next, add the client-side validation script function to the ASP.NET (.aspx) page. 如果你使用的 Visual Basic Scripting Edition (VBScript)，该函数必须以这种形式：If you are using Visual Basic Scripting Edition (VBScript), the function must be in this form: ``` Sub ValidationFunctionName(source, arguments) ``` 如果你使用的 JScript，该函数必须以这种形式：If you are using JScript, the function must be in this form: ``` function ValidationFunctionName(source, arguments) ``` `source`参数是对引用\<跨越 > 元素呈现为控件。The `source` parameter is a reference to the \ element rendered for the control. 这使您能够以编程方式控制\<跨越 > 标记，例如修改属性。This allows you to programmatically control the \ tag, such as modifying the attribute. `arguments`参数是一个对象具有两个属性： 值和 IsValid。The `arguments` parameter is an object with two properties: Value and IsValid. 此参数，可获取控件来验证，并以指示值是否有效的基于自定义验证例程的值。This parameter allows you to get the value of the control to validate and to indicate whether the value is valid based on your custom validation routine. 使用属性来指定客户端验证脚本函数的名称与关联控件。Use the property to specify the name of the client-side validation script function associated with the control. 因为客户端上执行的脚本函数，该函数必须在目标浏览器支持，如 VBScript 或 JScript 语言。Because the script function is executed on the client, the function must be in a language that the target browser supports, such as VBScript or JScript. > [!NOTE] > 当你使用控件内部控制，请确保该验证程序控件与之关联的控件位于同一面板。When you use the control inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 有关使用，控制为部分页面更新，请参阅[局部页面呈现概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 服务器端验证，如要验证的输入控件中的字符串可通过使用属性`arguments`参数。Like server-side validation, the string from the input control to validate is accessed by using the property of the `arguments` parameter. 通过设置返回的验证结果属性`arguments`参数。Return the result of the validation by setting the property of the `arguments` parameter. > [!CAUTION] > 在使用验证程序控件时，应始终检查服务器端验证在执行任何处理之前的结果。When using validator controls, you should always check the results of server-side validation before performing any processing. 回发但之后调用事件方法之前，页调用验证程序控件和聚合到其结果属性。After a postback but before your event methods are called, the page calls the validator controls and aggregates their results into the property. (你还可以调用使用显式的验证程序控件`Validate`方法。)在你自己的代码中，应检查属性返回`true`之前处理输入。(You can also call the validator controls explicitly using the `Validate` method.) In your own code, you should check that the property returns `true` before processing input. 即使启用脚本的浏览器可能会阻止回发发生客户端上，如果验证检查失败，始终还应检查服务器在处理经验证的数据之前的代码中。Even though script-enabled browsers might prevent a postback from occurring on the client if a validation check has failed, you should always also check in server code before processing validated data. 多个验证控件可以与单个输入控件，用于验证不同的条件。Multiple validation controls can be used with an individual input control to validate different criteria. 例如，你可以将多个验证控件应用上控件，它允许用户输入要添加到购物车的项的数量。For example, you can apply multiple validation controls on a control that allows the user to enter the quantity of items to add to a shopping cart. 你可以使用控件以确保指定的值小于清单中的金额和控件以确保用户输入值转换为控件。You can use a control to ensure that the value specified is less than the amount in inventory and a control to ensure that the user enters a value into the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果输入的控件为空，没有验证函数调用和验证成功。If the input control is empty, no validation functions are called and validation succeeds. 使用控件要求用户在输入控件中输入数据。Use a control to require the user to enter data in the input control. 可以使用无设置控制属性。It is possible to use a control without setting the property. 这种情况通常出现在验证多个输入的控件或验证不能用于验证控件，如的输入的控件时控件。This is commonly done when you are validating multiple input controls or validating input controls that cannot be used with validation controls, such as the control. 在这种情况下，属性`arguments`参数传递给事件处理程序事件和与客户端验证函数始终包含一个空字符串 ("")。In this case, the property of the `arguments` parameter passed to the event handler for the event and to the client-side validation function always contains an empty string (""). 但是，验证调用这些函数是仍，在适当的情况以确定服务器和客户端上的有效性。However, these validation functions are still called, where appropriate, to determine validity on both the server and client. 若要访问要验证的值，必须以编程方式引用你想要验证，然后从相应的属性中检索值的输入的控件。To access the value to validate, you must programmatically reference the input control you want to validate and then retrieve the value from the appropriate property. 例如，若要验证控制在服务器上，未设置属性验证控件并为处理程序使用下面的代码事件。For example, to validate a control on the server, do not set the property of the validation control and use the following code for the handler for the event. ```vb Sub ServerValidation (source As object, args As ServerValidateEventArgs) args.IsValid = (CheckBox1.Checked = True) End Sub ``` ```csharp void ServerValidation (object source, ServerValidateEventArgs args) { args.IsValid = (CheckBox1.Checked == true); } ``` 验证控件的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on validation controls, see . ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建服务器端控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a server-side control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomValidatorServerValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorServerValidate/CS/customvalidatorservervalidatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomValidatorServerValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorServerValidate/VB/customvalidatorservervalidatevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建客户端控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a client-side control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomValidatorClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorClient/CS/customvalidatorclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomValidatorClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorClient/VB/customvalidatorclientvb.aspx#1)]

Protected Overrides Sub AddAttributesToRender (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

param.name: writer
param.span: 包含用于在客户端上进行呈现的输出流的 。

span.span: A that contains the output stream for rendering on the client.

summary.span: 将 控件的属性添加到输出流以便在客户端上呈现。

span.span: Adds the properties of the control to the output stream for rendering on the client.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便错误消息始终以粗体显示。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the error message always appears in bold. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_customvalidator_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_customvalidator_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_customvalidator_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_customvalidator_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ClientValidationFunction { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于验证的自定义客户端脚本函数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the custom client-side script function used for validation.

value.span: 用于验证的自定义客户端脚本函数的名称。

span.span: The name of the custom client script function used for validation.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

para.span: 函数名不应包含任何括号或参数。

span.span: The function name should not include any parentheses or parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为执行客户端验证函数的名称。Set this property to the name of the function that performs the client-side validation. 因为在目标浏览器上运行的客户端验证函数，必须使用支持的浏览器，如 JScript 或 VBScript 脚本语言编写函数。Because the client validation function runs on the target browser, the function must be written using a scripting language supported by the browser, such as JScript or VBScript. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定执行客户端验证函数的名称。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the name of the function that performs client-side validation. 验证函数检查偶数。The validation function checks for even numbers. 函数参数的说明，请参阅备注部分的。For a description of the function parameters, see the Remarks section of . > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomValidatorClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorClient/CS/customvalidatorclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomValidatorClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorClient/VB/customvalidatorclientvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 检查有效值的控件属性。

span.span: Checks the properties of the control for valid values.

returns.span: 如果控件属性有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control properties are valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便它始终返回的值的可见属性，只要属性控件在页上，并包含验证属性。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always returns the value of the visible property, as long as the property of the control is on the page and contains validation properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid/CS/custom_customvalidator_controlpropertiesvalidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid/VB/custom_customvalidator_controlpropertiesvalidvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid/CS/custom_customvalidator_controlpropertiesvalid.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid/VB/custom_customvalidator_controlpropertiesvalid.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool EvaluateIsValid() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function EvaluateIsValid () As Boolean

returns.span: 如果输入控件中的值有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value in the input control is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写自定义服务器控件中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_customvalidator_evaluateisvalidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_customvalidator_evaluateisvalidvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_customvalidator_evaluateisvalid.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_customvalidator_evaluateisvalid.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnServerValidate(string value) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function OnServerValidate (value As String) As Boolean

summary.span: 为 控件引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event for the control.

returns.span: 如果 参数所指定的值通过验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value specified by the parameter passes validation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时服务器上执行验证，则将引发事件。The event is raised when validation is performed on the server. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何编写为在服务器端处理程序并指定控件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for a server-side control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomValidatorServerValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorServerValidate/CS/customvalidatorservervalidatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomValidatorServerValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorServerValidate/VB/customvalidatorservervalidatevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ServerValidate As ServerValidateEventHandler

summary.span: 在服务器上执行验证时发生。

span.span: Occurs when validation is performed on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时服务器上执行验证，则将引发事件。The event is raised when validation is performed on the server. 此事件用于提供自定义验证例程的输入控件，如控件。This event is used to provide a custom validation routine for an input control, such as a control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何编写为在服务器端处理程序并指定控件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for a server-side control. 它将创建一个自定义验证例程，验证的值控件是否为偶数，然后显示验证的结果。It creates a custom validation routine, validates the value of a control for an even number, and then displays the result of the validation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomValidatorServerValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorServerValidate/CS/customvalidatorservervalidatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomValidatorServerValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorServerValidate/VB/customvalidatorservervalidatevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ValidateEmptyText { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是否应该验证空文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether empty text should be validated.

value.span: 如果应该验证空文本，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if empty text should be validated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个验证程序可以与目标控件相关联。Each validator can be associated with a targeted control. 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，如果目标的控件必须为空字符串值，如属性具有的值，验证程序 (除验证程序) 将不会计算目标的控件和而只是返回传递的验证。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, if the targeted control had an empty string value, such as a property having a value of , the validator (except for the validator) would not evaluate the targeted control and would simply return that the validation passed. 属性是用于.NET Framework 2.0 版的新功能。The property is new for the .NET Framework version 2.0. 如果设置为`true`，验证程序的计算结果控件的值 (使用到指定的条件控件)，并返回验证结果。If is set to `true`, the validator evaluates the control's value (using the criteria specified to the control) and returns the validation results. 此属性允许开发人员的结果进行评估而不考虑目标控件的值的控件。This property allows developers to evaluate the results of a control regardless of the value of the targeted control. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
